title: Design and Application of a Machine Learning Model for Predicting e-Learning Student Satisfaction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical analysis, foundational machine learning concepts, and experience with e-learning platforms
context.additional_context: A blended learning course incorporating data analysis and model-building practice using personal devices, with a focus on predictive modeling for eLearning effectiveness analysis.

learning_goals: Learners can design data preprocessing procedures to implement an e-learning satisfaction prediction model
Learners can achieve over 85% accuracy in predicting e-learning satisfaction using XGBoost/KNN-based classification models
Learners can interpret model performance metrics (precision, recall, F1-score) and propose improvement strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
